basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello I'm Marco! I'm currently studying software development with a focus in Advanced Python programming. My background is in the service industry, where I spent almost 10 years honing technical and interpersonal skills that make me a great speaker, listener, and compassionate confidante. I have a knack for foreign language acquisition; I love to travel and learn about our planet and the people living on it. I want to help others, and outside of my volunteer work I want to serve my community and the world at large by making use of my ability to listen, learn fast, create, plan and execute. I want programming to become the medium through which I help others change the world.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Take Ten
projects.description: One of the first apps I developed on a team at Code Fellows! I had to develop front-end implementation for this app that takes in user input and generates a custom workout or set of stretches and stores the workout locally. I used JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS to help get this project off the ground.
